channel.title: What should I do with this acc?
channel.description:
I just found an old file with some user names and passwords on and found this acc. I decided that I wanted to do something with it, but don't know where to go or what quests to do with the stats. If I can, I would like to make it a good member/f2p pker, but seeing as I've been out of the RS scene for a couple of years now, I don't know what is necessary to be good.
Does anyone have any suggestions on what I should train/where I should train/what should I aim for?
[URL=http://img682.imageshack.us/i/16448805.jpg/][IMG]http://img682.imageshack.us/img682/9132/16448805.jpg[/img][/URL]
TY :)

item.title: What should I do with this acc?
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Maulers are cool, and you could go with that. Watch some pk videos maybe if you haven’t played RS in a while, or you might be in for a surprise.

item.source: What should I do with this acc?

item.title: What should I do with this acc?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

No need for 52 prayer anymore – smite is effectively useless for acquiring the player’s one item now that you either lose or keep the item based on the world you use.

If you’re going to be a f2p pker, then simply do the maths with regards to the prayer level.
At 80 strength, the 15% bonus will add 12 strength points to your level while active.
If you’re quite happy to recharge your prayer by visiting the monks then so be it.

However 31 prayer levels is 3 (nearly 4) combat levels. So you could just get 90 strength and higher range in lieu of it. Same damage, but you never have to recharge prayer.
Really boils down to whether or not you’re prepared to acquire 6.5 million strength xp as opposed to roughly 2 million.

All of that aside, the game is absolutely shit in the PvP department.

Read full topic
item.source: What should I do with this acc?

item.title: What should I do with this acc?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:5, topic:313028”]I have members on it already and was just cutting a few 1000 yews to get some money to buy the basic shit. Not sure if I could be arsed with the snape grass method…might just raise up WC and fishing to raise money.

Are maulers still good these days? I was thinking stats along the lines of:
70 att
80+ str
1 def
52 pray? or 1 pray?
70+ range
mage 1 or mage 70+?[/quote]
Maulers rape ftp and p2p.

Fuck mage.
Prayer is 31.
50/51 Attack
80 str+
70 Range+

These stats own ftp and p2p.

Also, personally I think getting 1k snapes would be faster then getting 1k yews. And same amount of money.

Read full topic

item.title: What should I do with this acc?
item.dc:creator: @cows_be_sacred cows_be_sacred
item.description:
@cows_be_sacred wrote:

Uhh, this is a good starters account indeed, just from the wc level.

I would say get members as soon as possible and start collecting snape grass.
[The prices have gone up tremendously]
Don’t be a douche and sell them on low because that will then start lowering the price.

1k Snapes is 1.5 hrs, which means you’ll get 450k. Get enough for 1mil and have that ready.

Then get your wc level to 80 and cut magic trees.

After you have some money [5mil ~] start raising your pking stats.
50attk/80str = great mauler

And go on from there

Edit: Get range up as well [Just buy range off with a cannon machiene at rock crabs]

Read full topic
